text: Dysgonomonas macrotermitis is a Gram-negative, facultatively anaerobic and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Dysgonomonas which has been isolated from the hindgut from the termite Macrotermes barneyi. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Dysgonomonas macrotermitis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacteroidetes Category:Bacteria described in 2014
title: Dysgonomonas macrotermitis
